spells.description:
Rengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage and grants him increased Attack Speed.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar deals enhanced damage and doubles his Attack Speed bonus.
spells.name: Savagery
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack within 2 seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Grants {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Additionally deals {{ e2 }}% of Rengar's Attack Damage {{ f1 }} in bonus damage, and the Attack Speed bonus is doubled.

spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and gaining bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar heals based on his level and missing health.
spells.name: Battle Roar
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Grants {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic resist for 3 seconds if an enemy is hit.

Ferocity bonus: Rengar restores {{ f1 }} of his missing Health.

spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola at his target, slowing them for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Roots the target for 1 second.
spells.name: Bola Strike
spells.tooltip:
Throws a bola dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}%, enemy Movement Speed recovers over 2.5 seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Roots the target for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.description: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing and revealing all enemy Champions in a large radius around him. He gains Movement Speed and rapidly generates Ferocity while stealthed.
spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spells.tooltip:
Activates predatory instincts stealthing Rengar after 1 second (delayed up to 3 seconds if taking damage), and revealing enemy Champions within {{ e3 }} range.

Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and 5 Ferocity over 3.75 seconds. Lasts {{ f1 }} seconds or until Rengar uses an ability that removes his stealth.

passive.description: Each of Warwick's attacks will heal him. Each successive attack against the same target will steal more and more Health.
passive.name: Eternal Thirst

spells.description: Takes a bite out of an enemy unit and heals Warwick.
spells.name: Hungering Strike
spells.tooltip: Strikes an enemy for the greater value between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }}) of the target's maximum Health as magic damage (can only do flat damage to monsters), and heals Warwick for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

spells.description: Warwick lets out a howl, increasing all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.name: Hunters Call
spells.tooltip: Warwick lets out a howl that inspires all nearby allied champions, increasing Warwick's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed by half of that for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Warwick passively senses weakened enemy champions around him. The scent of blood sends him into a fury, causing him to move at incredible speeds.
spells.name: Blood Scent
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Warwick senses enemy champions under 50% Health within {{ e1 }} distance of him; while he detects a low-health enemy, he reveals them if they are not stealthed and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

spells.description: Warwick lunges at an enemy champion, suppressing his target and dealing magic damage for a few seconds.
spells.name: Infinite Duress
spells.tooltip:
Warwick lunges in front of an enemy champion and suppresses them for {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Warwick attacks his victim {{ e4 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage (triggers on-hit effects {{ e4 }} times).

Warwick gains {{ e3 }}% Life Steal for the duration.

passive.description: Basic attacks lower all ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds. Double effect when attacking champions.
passive.name: Energize

spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck.  If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage. Whenever he hits a target with Crystal Slash he gains a stacking buff that increases his Attack Speed for a few seconds.
spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds and gains {{ e8 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e9 }} seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

spells.description: Skarner gains a shield, and while the shield persists his Movement Speed is increased.
spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains {{ e5 }}% increased Movement Speed that ramps up over 3 seconds.

spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them.
spells.name: Fracture
spells.tooltip: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

spells.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals magic damage to it.  During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him.  When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.name: Impale
spells.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
passive.name: Granite Shield

spells.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing movement speed for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Seismic Shard
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Activating Brutal Strikes greatly increases his Armor and Attack Damage for a short amount of time.
spells.name: Brutal Strikes
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's basic attacks hit units near his target for {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage.

Active: Malphite's Armor and Attack Damage increase by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Malphite slams the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.name: Ground Slam
spells.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

spells.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.tooltip: Malphite charges toward the target area, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

passive.description: Yasuo's critical strike chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.
passive.name: Way of the Wanderer

spells.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
spells.name: Steel Tempest
spells.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 10 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by attack speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

spells.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Dashing builds an extra {{ e3 }}% of your maximum Flow.

Active: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

spells.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating magic damage with each cast.
spells.name: Sweeping Blade
spells.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base damage by 25%, up to 100%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

spells.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
spells.name: Last Breath
spells.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo gains {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.

passive.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore mana.
passive.name: Mana Surge

spells.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.name: Arcanopulse
spells.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the mana cost is refunded.

spells.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spells.name: Eye of Destruction
spells.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by 10% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
spells.name: Shocking Orb
spells.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.75 and 2 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

spells.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains three shots of a long-range attack.
spells.name: Rite of the Arcane
spells.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining {{ e2 }} Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit.

The root ends after {{ e1 }} seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If Xerath does not fire off a single Arcane Barrage, half of the cooldown of Rite of the Arcane is refunded.

passive.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes stealthed indefinitely. After leaving stealth, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his attack speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
passive.name: Camouflage

spells.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
spells.name: Blinding Dart
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his movement speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus movement speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spells.name: Move Quick
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

spells.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Toxic Shot
spells.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

spells.description: Teemo places an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time.
spells.name: Noxious Trap
spells.tooltip:
Uses a stored mushroom to place a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows movement speed by {{ e2 }}% and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Lifesteal.
passive.name: Soul Eater

spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

spells.description: Nasus ages his target, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
spells.name: Wither
spells.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.

passive.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
passive.name: Reign of Anger

spells.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him and healing for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spells.name: Cull the Meek
spells.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and gains 5% of the damage dealt as Health (20% for champions), up to {{ e2 }}.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Heal percent increased to 10%, up to {{ e3 }}.

spells.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Ruthless Predator
spells.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e3 }} + {{ e2 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns for 0.75 seconds. Each hit applies on-hit effects.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, dealing {{ f2 }} physical damage ({{ e4 }} + {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns his target for 1.5 seconds.

spells.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the armor of units hit.
spells.name: Slice and Dice
spells.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for 4 seconds.

spells.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spells.name: Dominus
spells.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

passive.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion or monster. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.
passive.name: League of Draven

spells.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.name: Spinning Axe
spells.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e2 }}% of his total Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

spells.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.name: Blood Rush
spells.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

spells.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.name: Stand Aside
spells.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.name: Whirling Death
spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

passive.description: Shaco deals 20% bonus damage when striking a unit from behind.
passive.name: Backstab

spells.description: Shaco becomes invisible and teleports to target location. His next attack is guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.name: Deceive
spells.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.

His next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing {{ e1 }}% damage (normal critical strikes deal {{ e2 }}% damage).

spells.description: Shaco creates an animated Jack-in-the-Box at target location, which will wait, invisible, to Fear nearby units and attack them when some come nearby.
spells.name: Jack In The Box
spells.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacking them.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and it lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing.

spells.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing them and applying a miss chance to minions. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target.
spells.name: Two-Shiv Poison
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Also reduces minions' chance to hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.name: Hallucinate
spells.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

On death, the clone detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

passive.description: Swain regenerates mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.
passive.name: Carrion Renewal

spells.description: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target is damaged and slowed.
spells.name: Decrepify
spells.tooltip: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and is slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
spells.name: Nevermove
spells.tooltip: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.description: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain.
spells.name: Torment
spells.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Swain deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the afflicted target.

spells.resource: {{ e2 }} Initial Mana Cost Per Second
spells.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 3 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.
spells.name: Ravenous Flock
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions, and {{ e5 }}% against minions.

The cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e4 }} mana each second.

passive.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
passive.name: Short Fuse

spells.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.name: Bouncing Bomb
spells.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.
spells.name: Satchel Charge
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away.

Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

spells.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spells.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
spells.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies farther away take {{ e2 }}% damage. Minions take double damage.

passive.description: Increases the Movement Speed of all allied champions by 5%.
passive.name: Tailwind

spells.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.name: Howling Gale
spells.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air. The whirlwind travels farther, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus damage, and knocks enemies higher, for each second it charges (up to a maximum of 3 seconds).

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

spells.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.name: Zephyr
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.

spells.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.name: Eye Of The Storm
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

spells.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.name: Monsoon
spells.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

passive.description: Talon deals 10% more damage with his basic attacks to any target that is slowed, stunned, immobilized, or suppressed.
passive.name: Mercy

spells.description: Talon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. If the target is a champion, they will bleed, taking additional physical damage over a period of time and revealing their location for the duration.
spells.name: Noxian Diplomacy
spells.tooltip: Talon's next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If the target is a champion, the target will bleed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds, revealing their location for the duration.

spells.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed for a short duration.
spells.name: Rake
spells.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.description: Talon instantly appears behind his target, silencing them and amplifying his damage against that target.
spells.name: Cutthroat
spells.tooltip: Talon teleports to the far side of his target, silencing them for {{ e1 }} second and amplifying Talon's damage against the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
spells.name: Shadow Assault
spells.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through.

passive.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.
passive.name: Clockwork Windup

spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her ball remains at the target location after.
spells.name: Command: Attack
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

spells.description: Orianna commands the ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
spells.name: Command: Dissonance
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
spells.name: Command: Protect
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

passive.description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced by 10.

spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.

spells.tooltip:

spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.

spells.tooltip:

passive.description: Fiora regenerates health over 6 seconds each time she deals damage. Striking champions will cause this effect to stack up to 4 times.

spells.description: Fiora dashes forward to strike her target, dealing physical damage. Fiora can perform the dash a second time within a couple seconds at no mana cost.

spells.tooltip:

Fiora can perform the dash a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds at no mana cost.

spells.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.

Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

spells.name: Audacious Charge
spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.description: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist based on number of champions hit.
spells.name: Crescent Sweep
spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) plus 15% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks enemies back (max 600 vs minions and monsters). Xin Zhao gains {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 6 seconds for each champion hit.

Challenge: If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.

passive.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
passive.name: Deadly Venom

spells.description: Twitch becomes invisible for a short duration, while invisible Twitch gains movement speed. When leaving invisibility twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.name: Ambush
spells.tooltip:
After {{ e4 }} seconds of not taking damage or after {{ e5 }} seconds, Twitch turns invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Twitch gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed while invisible and gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after coming out of invisibility.

spells.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
spells.name: Venom Cask
spells.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area adding {{ e1 }} stacks of Deadly Venom and slowing targets by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.description: All nearby enemies secrete Twitch's toxic venoms from their bodies, dealing damage for each stack.
spells.name: Expunge
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom.

spells.description: Twitch closes his eyes and fires his crossbow, rapidly spraying powerful piercing bolts ahead of him.
spells.name: Spray and Pray
spells.tooltip: For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range, {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

passive.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
passive.name: Double Strike

spells.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path. Alpha strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
spells.name: Alpha Strike
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each and an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.

spells.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time.
spells.name: Meditate
spells.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by 1% for every 1% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

spells.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
spells.name: Wuju Style
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal bonus {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

spells.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extends Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
spells.name: Highlander
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to movement reduction effects for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

passive.description: After casting a spell, Taric's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage based on his Armor and reduces his cooldowns.
passive.name: Gemcraft

spells.description: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal an ally and himself. This heal is more potent when Taric heals only himself.
spells.name: Imbue
spells.tooltip: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal a target ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e6 }}% of Taric's bonus health). If he targets himself, the heal increases by {{ e4 }}% restoring {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) health.

spells.description: Taric is protected by a hardening aura, increasing the Armor of himself and nearby allied champions. He may choose to splinter the enchanted rocks surrounding him to deal damage and decrease the Armor of nearby enemies at the cost of some Armor for a short time.
spells.name: Shatter
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Taric's gemstones increase his Armor by {{ e3 }}. Additionally, nearby allied champions gain {{ f1 }} Armor ({{ e4 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Taric shatters his armor, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) for {{ e5 }} seconds. Taric loses {{ e3 }} Armor while Shatter is on cooldown.

spells.description: Taric emits a brilliant ball of prismatic light from his gemmed shield, stunning his target and damaging them based on how close he is to them.
spells.name: Dazzle
spells.tooltip: Taric fires a prismatic sphere at a target enemy, stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Dazzle's damage increases the closer Taric is to the target.

spells.description: Taric slams his hammer into the ground to deal damage to nearby enemies. For a time after, Taric's gems radiate energy, empowering Taric and his allies with bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power.
spells.name: Radiance
spells.tooltip:
Taric slams his hammer into the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

For the next {{ e2 }} seconds, Taric's gems radiate energy, granting him {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and Ability Power and his nearby allies half of the bonuses.

passive.description: Amumu's attacks reduce the target's Magic Resistance for a short duration.
passive.name: Cursed Touch

spells.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them for 1 second, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum health each second.
spells.name: Despair
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.name: Tantrum
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

spells.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

passive.description: Gangplank's basic attacks and Parrrley apply a poison that deals magic damage each second and slows movement speed. Lasts 3 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.
passive.name: Grog-Soaked Blade

spells.description: Gangplank takes aim and shoots an enemy unit with his pistol. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, he gains extra gold and half the mana cost is refunded.
spells.name: Parrrley
spells.tooltip:
Gangplank shoots a target unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, Gangplank gains {{ e2 }} extra gold and half the mana cost is refunded.

Parrrley can crit and applies on hit effects as if a melee basic attack.

Total Gold Plundered: {{ f2 }} gold.

spells.description: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him and heals him.
spells.name: Remove Scurvy
spells.tooltip: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him and heals him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health.

spells.description: Gangplank fires a shot into the air, increasing nearby allied champions' attack damage and movement speed.
spells.name: Raise Morale
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gangplank gains {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

Active: Gangplank fires his pistol into the air, disabling his passive boost but increasing his Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% and nearby allied champions' Attack Damage and Movement Speed by half that amount for 7 seconds.

spells.description: Gangplank signals his ship to fire upon an area for 6 seconds, slowing enemies and dealing damage in random locations within the area.
spells.name: Cannon Barrage
spells.tooltip: Signals Gangplank's ship to fire upon an area for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e2 }}% for the duration. Cannonballs rain upon the area, each causing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
passive.name: King's Tribute

spells.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
spells.name: Chomp
spells.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e2 }} for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

spells.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
spells.name: Frozen Domain
spells.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

spells.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
spells.name: Pillar of Ice
spells.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic resistance stolen is doubled.
spells.name: Subjugate
spells.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as magic damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

passive.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and transforms this damage into bonus attack speed.
passive.name: Void Stone

spells.description: Kassadin fires an ethereal bolt of void energy, dealing damage and silencing the target for a duration.
spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.tooltip: Kassadin fires a void bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks restore Mana. The Mana restored is tripled against enemy champions. Active: Kassadin's basic attacks deal additional magic damage.
spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, restoring {{ e1 }} Mana each hit. If the target is an enemy champion, the Mana restored is tripled to {{ e3 }}.

Active: Kassadin charges his nether blade for {{ e4 }} seconds causing his basic attacks to deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.tooltip: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds in a cone in front of him.

spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana. Multiple champion hits with Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to deal additional damage.
spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.tooltip:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Additionally, each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds costs {{ e5 }} additional Mana and deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional damage, stacks up to 10 times.

If Kassadin hits an enemy champion with Riftwalk, it refunds {{ e4 }}% of the cost.

passive.description: Vel'Koz's spells build Organic Deconstruction stacks on enemies. The third spell hit consumes the stacks and deals bonus true damage.
passive.name: Organic Deconstruction

spells.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
spells.name: Plasma Fission
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

spells.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
spells.name: Void Rift
spells.tooltip: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage. Both hits add a stack of Organic Deconstruction.

spells.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
spells.name: Tectonic Disruption
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

spells.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals damage and slows enemies.
spells.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
spells.tooltip:
Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}), and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}% for 1 second. Adds a stack of Organic Deconstruction every 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by recasting.

passive.description: When Zyra dies, she briefly returns to her plant form. After 2 seconds, she can press any ability to fire a thorn toward her cursor, dealing true damage to each enemy it strikes.
passive.name: Rise of the Thorns

spells.description: Zyra grows a bud at target location. After a brief delay, it explodes, launching damaging thorns at all nearby enemies. If cast upon a seed, Deadly Bloom grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.name: Deadly Bloom
spells.tooltip:
Thorns shoot from the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within the area.

Rampant Growth: If Deadly Bloom hits a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.description: Zyra plants a seed, granting vision of an area for up to 30 seconds. Other spells cast on seeds will turn them into plants, who fight for Zyra. Additionally passively grants her Cooldown Reduction.
spells.name: Rampant Growth
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Plants a seed, lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it will be destroyed but they will be revealed for 2 seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ f1 }} seconds (Max: 2 seeds stored, 4 seeds planted).

Rampant Growth: Cast spells on seeds to grow plants. Plant damage is based on Zyra's level. Extra plants striking the same target deal 50% less damage.

spells.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast upon a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy movement speed.
spells.name: Grasping Roots
spells.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second.

Rampant Growth: If Grasping Roots hits a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
spells.name: Stranglethorns
spells.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air.

Rampant Growth: Plants within the thicket are enraged, increasing their Attack Speed by 50%.

passive.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain movement speed for a short duration.
passive.name: Surging Tides

spells.description: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.tooltip: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

spells.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for {{ e5 }} seconds or {{ e4 }} basic attacks. The ally's basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies.
spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position.

The Tidal Wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

passive.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
passive.name: Martial Cadence

spells.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spells.name: Dragon Strike
spells.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path.

spells.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spells.name: Golden Aegis
spells.tooltip: Temporarily gains a shield that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed and Armor. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
spells.name: Demacian Standard
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }} Armor.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

spells.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them.
spells.name: Cataclysm
spells.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

passive.description: Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his Attack Speed by 10% for 5 seconds (effect stacks up to 5 times).
passive.name: Rising Spell Force

spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 second if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1 second if Mystic Shot hits a target.

spells.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Allied champions hit by the wave have their Attack Speed increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.description: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.tooltip: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).
